answerText: The Martian Chronicles[10] The Martian Chronicles was written by this science fiction author who also wrote Dandelion Wine and Fahrenheit 451.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 15 | 2 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In one story from this collection, William Stendhal reconstructs the mansion from "The Fall of the House of Usher" and rigs it with traps to murder the visiting "Moral Climate Monitors." For 10 points each: [10] Name this collection, containing stories like "Night Meeting" and "There Will Come Soft Rains," all vaguely about the colonization of a certain place.
